head.title: Developer guide
head.description: Developer guide Rules - working on stylelint's rules. Plugins - writing your own plugins. Processors - writing your own processorsâ€¦

body:
#Developer guide

  • Rules - working on stylelint's rules.
  • Plugins - writing your own plugins.
  • Processors - writing your own processors.
  • Formatters - writing your own formatters.
  • Rule testers - using and writing rule testers.
  • Benchmarks - running benchmarks on rules.
rawBody:
# Developer guide

- [Rules](/developer-guide/rules/) - working on stylelint's rules.
- [Plugins](/developer-guide/plugins/) - writing your own plugins.
- [Processors](/developer-guide/processors/) - writing your own processors.
- [Formatters](/developer-guide/formatters/) - writing your own formatters.
- [Rule testers](/developer-guide/rule-testers/) - using and writing rule testers.
- [Benchmarks](/developer-guide/benchmarks/) - running benchmarks on rules.
raw:
---
title: Developer guide
---

# Developer guide

- [Rules](/developer-guide/rules/) - working on stylelint's rules.
- [Plugins](/developer-guide/plugins/) - writing your own plugins.
- [Processors](/developer-guide/processors/) - writing your own processors.
- [Formatters](/developer-guide/formatters/) - writing your own formatters.
- [Rule testers](/developer-guide/rule-testers/) - using and writing rule testers.
- [Benchmarks](/developer-guide/benchmarks/) - running benchmarks on rules.
